long_description: After a day of hiking or biking, your muscles need a protein boost to help them repair and recover. With at least 14g of vegan protein, the tasty Hammer Nutrition Vegan Recovery bar does the trick. Both the Chocolate Peanut and Almond Cacao flavors combine organic tapioca, pea protein and organic brown rice protein with other high-quality ingredients for a great taste. Chocolate Peanut flavor contains 14g of protein per bar; Almond Cacao flavor has 15g per bar. Kosher bars are free of gluten, genetically modified organisms and soy protein; no trans fat or cholesterol. Almond Cacao flavor is 100% soy free; Chocolate Peanut flavor has just a trace of soy in the form of lecithin. Easy-to-chew Hammer Nutrition Vegan Recovery bars are made almost entirely from organic ingredients. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: After a day of hiking or biking, your muscles need a protein boost to help them repair and recover. With at least 14g of vegan protein, the tasty Hammer Nutrition Vegan Recovery bar does the trick.
